tool_description: BRANDNEW API for trading bots and financial analytic systems based on news, listings on the biggest exchanges, and inter-exchange arbitrage.
title: Crypto Compass

api_list.name: News
api_list.description:
Returns latest news from all supported exchanges

Response

Key Description
date date of publication
title title of announsment
text text of announsment
news_url url of original announsment
source_name name of exchange that released announsment

anounsments.text: .css-14vs3o1{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;color:#0e101a;}28.01.2022 в 15:00 (мск) платформа Binance Staking запустит серию новых промоакций высокодоходного фиксированного стейкинга SAND с массой вознаграждений.
anounsments.title: Специальное предложение для стейкинга SAND: доходность до 24,50% годовых и призовой фонд в 18900SAND

anounsments.text: Реферальная программа .css-li4l4s{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;display:inline;color:#F0B90B;}.css-li4l4s:visited{color:#F0B90B;}.css-li4l4s:hover{color:#F0B90B;opacity:0.5;}.css-1f5vusx{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;color:#1155cc;}своп-фарминга — это возможность получить бонус до 200 BUSD. При этом каждый из ваших соответствующих требованиям рефералов получит 5 BUSD. Количество друзей, которых можно пригласить, не ограничено. А значит, чем больше друзей, тем больше ваш бонус! Эта промоакция доступна только в течение одного месяца.
anounsments.title: Реферальная программа своп-фарминга Binance: пригласите друзей и получите до 200BUSD

anounsments.text: .css-1vaed0j{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;color:#1e2026;}Пользователи Binance теперь могут использовать токены GLMR и SCRT в качестве активов для займа при торговле с изолированной маржой, а также BETA, DENT, POND, REEF, SLP и VOXEL в качестве активов для займа при кросс-маржинальной торговле.
anounsments.title: GLMR и SCRT доступны для торговли с изолированной маржой на Binance, BETA, DENT, POND, REEF, SLP и VOXEL – для кросс-маржинальной торговли

anounsments.text: Binance призывает все централизованные биржи обнародовать адреса кошельков страховых фондов. Это принесет пользу всей экосистеме и.css-1kcwta2{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;color:#0f0f0f;} продемонстрирует правительствам, регулирующим органам и заинтересованным участникам наше стремление к доверию, честности и прозрачности в криптоэкосистеме.
anounsments.title: Размер Фонда безопасных активов для пользователей (SAFU) оценивается в один миллиард долларов

anounsments.text: .css-1vaed0j{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;min-width:0;color:#1e2026;}Binance откладывает начало торговли парами XNO/USDT, XNO/BUSD, XNO/BTC и XNO/ETH на 28.01.2022 11:00 (мск), поскольку распределение XNO еще не завершено.
anounsments.title: Торговля парами с XNO откроется позже

api_list.name: New Listings
api_list.description:
Returns upcoming cryptocurrencies listings from the biggest exchanges

Response

Key Description
date date of publication
title title of announsment
text text of announsment
topic specific topic(if set)
ticker tiker of coin that's gonna be listed
news_url url of original announsment
news_type type of announsment(default "")
sentiment default ""
source_name name of exchange that released announsment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com/new_listings"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

anounsments.text: Binance will list Tribe (TRIBE) and will open trading for TRIBE/BTC, TRIBE/BNB, TRIBE/BUSD and TRIBE/USDT trading pairs at 2021-11-24 06:00 (UTC).
anounsments.title: Binance Will List Tribe (TRIBE)

api_list.name: Exchange info
api_list.description:
Accepts an exchange name as an input, returns a list of exchanges where the coin is traded, and prices for this coin

Request

Key Required Value Description
exchange required Binance name of exchange that you want to check

Response

Key Description
exchangeId unique identifier for exchange
name proper name of exchange
rank rank is in ascending order - this number is directly associated with the total exchange volume whereas the highest volume exchange receives rank 1
percentTotalVolume the amount of daily volume a single exchange transacts in relation to total daily volume of all exchanges
volumeUsd daily volume represented in USD
tradingPairs number of trading pairs (or markets) offered by exchange
socket true/false, true = trade socket available, false = trade socket unavailable
exchangeUrl website to exchange
updated UNIX timestamp (milliseconds) since information was received from this exchange

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: name of exchange that you want to check

api_list.name: Send Email
api_list.description:
You can send an email as a notification about a new listing using our pattern to be able to buy it before the price rase
#### Response

- status ok if letter sent else - error

api_list.name: Supported Exchanges
api_list.description: Returns a list of exchanges from which we receive data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com/supported_exchanges"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Subscribe for email notifications
api_list.description:
You can send your email address and for new listings, it will send notifications, if there are no errors it will return the status: ok and send a test letter to the email address. Later you will receive an email if new coins start listing at supported exchanges

#### Response

- status ok if alert set else - error

api_list.name: Asset info
api_list.description:
Accepts a coin ticker as an input, returns a list of exchanges where the coin is traded, and prices for this coin

Request

Key Required Value Description
asset required BTC tiker of coin that you want to check

Response

Key Description
priceUSD price for specific asset at specific exchange
volumePercent percent of trading volume of specific asset at specific exchange

api_list.name: New Pairs
api_list.description:
Returns upcoming currency pair exits on all supported exchanges

Response

Key Description
date date of publication
title title of announsment
text text of announsment
topic specific topic(if set)
ticker tiker of trading pair that's gonna be added
news_url url of original announsment
news_type type of announsment(default "")
sentiment extra parameter(default "")
source_name name of exchange that released announsment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com/new_pairs"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-compass.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
